segments.text: I can't believe my eyes with this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's drying a plate, totally zoned out on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water, but she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on the stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping backâ€”how is he balancing like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, part of the sneaky plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open, cookies spilling out almost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, so unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple kitchen could hide so much action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing fast, dishes nearby untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is wild, all happening under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a shocking mix of calm and craziness.
segments.speaker: PAR
